scripts.dist: yarn build && yarn nexe ./dist/index.cjs --build -o build/designs-divider && mkdir -p build/node_modules/canvas && cp -rp node_modules/canvas ./build/node_modules/ && cp -rp node_modules/jsdom ./build/node_modules/
scripts.dist:win:
yarn build && yarn nexe ./dist/index.cjs --build -o build/designs-divider && if not exist "build
ode_modules\canvas" mkdir build
ode_modules\canvas && if not exist "build
ode_modules\jsdom" mkdir build
ode_modules\jsdom && cp -rf node_modules\canvas . uild
ode_modules\ && cp -rf node_modules\jsdom . uild
ode_modules\
